Interface ITextCaptureService.ExtendedSettings

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRecognitionService.ExtendedSettings
    Enclosing interface:
    ITextCaptureService

    public static interface ITextCaptureService.ExtendedSettings
extends IRecognitionService.ExtendedSettings
    Extended service configuration settings. Settings for advanced users. Not used in typical scenarios
